alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:05PM EST until January 16 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Vermont and Essex County, New York. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will spread northward during the morning hours. Snowfall will peak in intensity during the afternoon when snowfall rates may reach 1" per hour. Snow will diminish from west to east during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
